metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4237 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Automation Platform. When creating a new keypair, the ec2_key module prints out the private key directly to the standard output. This flaw allows an attacker to fetch those keys from the log files, compromising the system's confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

notes.Note: sbeattie> core ansible binaries were split into ansible-base, which got renamed to ansible-core

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
